lead_paragraph: A new design for living was unfolded last week for the 132,000,000 people of the United States. The design provided for a planned economy, war-induced, and would affect every American home. From now on American life was to be molded to the needs of a government engaged in a war extending from America's shores to the far corners of the globe.
abstract: ed and lr on Roosevelt's Apr message to Cong on voluntary savings plan
